title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Investment
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Investment 

Firms) (Amendment) Regulations 2025.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european union (investment firms) (amendment) regulation 2025

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of
heading: 2. Regulation 11 of the European Union (Investment Firms) Regulations
text_raw:
2. Regulation 11 of the European Union (Investment Firms) Regulations 
2021 (S.I. No. 355 of 2021) is amended by the insertion of the following 
paragraph after paragraph (8): 

“(9) Where the State is the home Member State of an investment firm, the 
Bank shall give prior notification to the competent authority of a host Member 
State when it intends to utilise its powers under Part 3 of the Act of 2013 to 
conduct all necessary inspections at the business premises of the legal persons, 
and any other undertakings included in the supervision of compliance with the 
group capital test, where the Bank is the group supervisor.”.
text_norm: 2 regulation 11 european union (investment firms) regulation 2021 (s.i no 355 2021) amended insertion following paragraph paragraph (8) (9) state home member state investment firm bank shall give prior notification competent authority host member state intends utilise power part 3 act 2013 conduct necessary inspection business premise legal person undertaking included supervision compliance group capital test bank group supervisor

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of
heading: 3. Regulation 74 of
text_raw:
3. Regulation 74 of 

the European Union (Capital Requirements) 
Regulations 2014 (S.I. No. 158 of 2014) is amended, in paragraph (9), by the 
substitution of the following subparagraph for subparagraph (j): 

subject to paragraph (11), take the necessary operational steps to ensure 

“(j) 
that liquidity recovery plans can be implemented immediately.”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

6 February, 2025. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance. 

1 OJ No. L314, 5.12.2019, p. 64 
2 OJ No. L176, 27.06.2013, p. 338 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 7th February, 2025.
